Future Ready Certification recognizes school that are moving towards preparing students for success in college, careers, and citizenship. ...
Board of Education approves 2019 -2020 District Calendar ...

div.p: River Vale School District reinforces respectful behavior to create a safe school environment for all students.
The Board of Education believes that the school facilities of our district should be made available for community purposes.
Please click here for important contact information.
Except in cases of emergency or action by the Board of Education, school will be kept open according to the school calendar.
Check out River Vale's Go Green Flyers for the latest news and announcements about our district.
River Vale School District's budget is now available. For more info, contact us.
